Ustedes no  cerrar comenzar a  inf empezar a  inf entender pensar perder preferir  inf querer  inf to close to begin to begin to understand to think to lose to miss to prefer to want to love eie almorzar  contar  dormir encontrar mostrar poder  inf recordar volver to have lunch to count to tell to sleep to find to show to be able to can to remember to return oue  Comenzar and empezar require the preposition a when they are followed by  an infinitive Comienzan a jugar a las siete Ana empieza a escribir una postal They begin playing at seven Ana is starting to write a postcard  Pensar  infinitive means to plan or to intend to do something Pensar en means  to think about someone or something Piensan ir al gimnasio En qu piensas Are you planning to go to the gym What are you thinking about The verb perder can  mean to lose or to  miss in the sense of  to miss a train Siempre pierdo  mis llaves I always lose my keys Es importante no  perder el autobs Its important not to  miss the bus Los chicos juegan  al ftbol Ella juega al tenis y al golf cierran Common stemchanging verbs LENGUA VIVA INTNTALO recursos p 126 pp 4142  pp 5556 vhlcentral duermo duermes duermen duerme dormimos duerme duermen cierras cerramos cierra cierro cierra cierran cierra Teaching Tips  Write eie and oue on the  board and explain that some  very common verbs have  these types of stem changes  Point out that all the verbs  listed are conjugated like  empezar or volver Model  the pronunciation of the  verbs and ask students  a few questions using  verbs of each type Have  them answer in complete  sentences Ex A qu hora  cierra la biblioteca Duermen  los estudiantes hasta tarde  por lo general Qu piensan  hacer este fin de semana  Quin quiere comer en un  restaurante esta noche  Point out the structure jugar  al used with sports Practice  it by asking students about  the sports they play Have  them answer in complete  sentences Ex ____ te  gusta jugar al ftbol Y t  ____ juegas al ftbol  Prefieres jugar al ftbol o  ver un partido en el estadio  Cuntos juegan al tenis  Qu prefieres ____ jugar   al tenis o jugar al ftbol  Prepare a few dehydrated  sentences Ex Ral  empezar   la leccin ustedes    mostrar  los trabajos  nosotros  jugar  al ftbol  Write them on the board one  at a time and ask students  to form complete sentences  based on the cues TPR Add an auditory aspect to this grammar presentation At  random call out infinitives of regular and eie stemchanging  verbs Have students raise their hands if the verb has a stem  change Repeat for oue stemchanging verbs Extra Practice For additional drills of stemchanging verbs do  the Intntalo activity orally using infinitives other than cerrar  and dormir Keep a brisk pace Large Group Have the class stand in a circle As you toss a  ball to a student call out the infinitive of a stemchanging verb  followed by a pronoun Ex querer t The student should say  the appropriate verb form quieres then name a different  pronoun
